broad.pda.feature.genome
Class DirectoryInstalledGenomeAssembly

java.lang.Object
  broad.pda.feature.genome.DirectoryInstalledGenomeAssembly

public class DirectoryInstalledGenomeAssembly
extends java.lang.Object

Represents a Genome Assembly were each directory is in its own directory which includes the AGP file It is a convenient way to access genomic data when it is stored in this standard way.

Author:
mgarber
